buginformation.summary: inherit doc doesn play well with interfaces
buginformation.description: use interface inheritance with inherit doc the compiler doesn know about the types used the method signature sample code interface interface function param string prototype foo function constructor implements function inherit doc prototype foo function alert substring error could not determine the type this expression should add this only shows with report unknown types turned should fixed head are you sure this fixed just tried this http closure compiler appspot com and didn produce any warnings interface function param string prototype foo function constructor implements function inherit doc prototype foo function alert substring var inst new inst foo but this does produce warnings interface function param string prototype foo function constructor implements function param string prototype foo function alert substring var inst new inst foo this not fixed nicolas could you reopen the bug you think this not fixed please open bug github with repro case the example here works you declare and rather than leave them global variables you can try appspot interface var function param string prototype foo function constructor implements var function inherit doc prototype foo function alert substring var inst new inst foo the varcheck pass the compiler which runs before type checking warns about global variables the code
